column5: Anybody here ever fished Seagraves before? I see it's a deep lake with walleye, pike and trout. Wondering how good the fishing is for all 3 species? Thanks!
Contact Shaggy at Hidden Bay Lodge, he could help with your question.
Yeah he said fishing is a little more of a challenge on this lake than the others, but it'd be nice to hear from someone that has had a stay there & what their experience has been.

http://kabeelo.com/lake-cabins/seagraves-lake Here is the link to kabeelo lodge which has a cabin there. We've been to another Kabeelo lake and found them to be very realistic about the fish (which was great) if you call them. Also, the link has entries from guest logs.
